experiment_ntl_tshark module¶

experiment_ntl_tshark.load_ntflow_csv(path: str | Path) → DataFrame[source]¶

Process NTLFlowLyzer flows in csv

Args:

path (PathLike): Path to NTLFlowLyzer csv file

Returns:

pd.DataFrame: all headers

experiment_ntl_tshark.load_other_flows_csv(path: str | Path) → Tuple[DataFrame, str][source]¶

Detects whether the CSV is from tsharkflows or scapyflows based on the columns, loads and normalizes it appropriately.

Args:

path (PathLike):Path to a csv file

Raises:

ValueError: Could not detect tool

Returns:

Tuple[pd.DataFrame, str]: (df, tool_name) with tool_name in {“tsharkflows”, “scapyflows”}.

experiment_ntl_tshark.load_scapyflows_csv(path: str | Path) → DataFrame[source]¶

Process scapy flows in csv

Args:

path (PathLike): Path to scapy csv file

Returns:

pd.DataFrame: Typical Header: ip.src,srcport,ip.dst,dstport,proto,stime,ltime,dur,pkts,bytes,payload_bytes,…

experiment_ntl_tshark.load_tsharkflows_csv(path: str | Path) → DataFrame[source]¶

Process tshark flows in csv

Args:

path (PathLike): Path to tshark csv file

Returns:

pd.DataFrame: Typical Header: ip.src,ip.dst,srcport,dstport,proto,stime,ltime,dur,pkts,bytes,…

experiment_ntl_tshark.main() → None[source]¶

Main function with argparse

experiment_ntl_tshark.run_experiment(ntflow_csv: str | Path, other_csv: str | Path, *, contamination: float = 0.05, top_n: int = 15, algos: List[str] | None = None, min_score: float | None = None) → None[source]¶

Run the experiment

Args:

ntflow_csv (PathLike): Path to NTLFlowLyzer csv file other_csv (PathLike): Path to another tool csv file contamination (float, optional): contamination. Defaults to 0.05. top_n (int, optional): How many lines to print. Defaults to 15. algos (List[str], optional): algorith picker. Defaults to None. min_score (float | None, optional): minimum score to consider. Defaults to None.
